name: 大卫·波瓦尔
introduction: David has numerous credits in theater, film, and television originating in Mexico City where he resided for many years. Major theater and film productions include: Grease, Phantom of the Opera, Two Mules for Sister Sara, Rio Lob, Soldier Blue etc. David is bilingual and an expert voice over professional. He is married to Victoria Povall, an educator and writer. Together they have three published novels "The Gift of the Twin Houses", "Secrets of Innocence" and "Jackal in the Mirror".
